column1: #text=I was about to go on a trip and I knew I 'd want some books to read on the plane and on the beach .
#text=I 'd spent enough money on this trip , no need to pay for books too !
#text=Instead , I found my library card and headed down to my local branch of the county library .
#text=They say not to pick a book by it 's cover but I always do .
#text=I always find myself grabbing the books the librarians have put up on display on top of the shelves .
#text=Soon I had an armful of books and I headed for the desk .
#text=The librarian was very friendly as she scanned a code inside each book and then asked for my library card .
#text=As I headed for the door , she reminded me the books would be due back in two weeks .
#text=That worked out perfectly , because that happened to be right when I would be back from my trip .
